name: Transmission
short_description: Fast, easy BitTorrent client with web interface. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr.
description: Fast, easy BitTorrent client with web interface. Self-host it with Docker using Yantr. Transmission is a self-hosted application focused on download, network, torrent, p2p. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Transmission on your home server to fast, easy bittorrent client with web interface. self-host it with docker using yantr without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Transmission to manage your download workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
